Uses of Class
org.apache.commons.math4.geometry.euclidean.twod.hull.ConvexHull2D

  • Packages that use ConvexHull2D 
    Package Description
    org.apache.commons.math4.geometry.euclidean.twod.hull
    This package provides algorithms to generate the convex hull for a set of points in an two-dimensional euclidean space.

    • Uses of ConvexHull2D in org.apache.commons.math4.geometry.euclidean.twod.hull

      ConvexHull2D ConvexHullGenerator2D.generate(java.util.Collection<Vector2D> points)
      Builds the convex hull from the set of input points.
